Package com.bumptech.glide.presenter

Interface Summary
ImagePresenter.ExceptionHandler<T> An interface for logging or otherwise handling exceptions that may occur during an image load
ImagePresenter.ImagePresenterCoordinator An interface used to coordinate multiple ImagePresenter objects acting on the same view
ImagePresenter.ImageReadyCallback<T> A callback interface used to perform some action when an ImagePresenter sets a new bitmap in an ImageView
 

Class Summary
ImagePresenter<T> Wraps an Target to display arbitrary Bitmaps and provides a framework for fetching and loading bitmaps correctly when targest are being recycled.
ImagePresenter.Builder<T> A builder for an ImagePresenter.
ThumbImagePresenter<A,B> Wraps a pair of ImagePresenter objects and uses them to load and display an image and a thumbnail for that image.
ThumbImagePresenter.Builder<A,B> A builder for a ThumbImagePresenter.
